comments: He\'s a really good math professor. Gives lots of examples in his lecture to help you in your homework. Expect lots of homework and kind of moves fast. He gives out study guides to prepare you for his exams which is very helpful. Has a little bit on an accent but its understandable.

comments: I loved his class. His teaching is very clear and wants his students to learn. Offers tutoring. Does assign HW with every section, but as long as you stay on top of your work you\'ll be fine. Gives study guide which is very helpful for exams. Don\'t miss class and don\'t fall behind on work. I would definitely take him again.

comments: If you struggle with math, wouldn\'t recommend this teacher, unless you\'re willing to put in effort and do lots of work. If you are taking more than 3 classes (including this one) beware that he give a lot of HW and it can get pretty overwhelming. He gives study guides for HW prior to taking a test so that is good practice but can be a work load.
